pinyin: kao4 shan1 chi1 shan1 , kao4 shui3 chi1 shui3

definitions.kao4 shan1 chi1 shan1 , kao4 shui3 chi1: lit. the mountain dweller lives off the mountain, the shore dweller lives off the sea (idiom); fig. to make the best use of local resources; to exploit one's position to advance oneself; to find one's niche; to live off the land;
